entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
